item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

December 26, 2011's location is: Cask Republic

By popular demand, the collective will be going back to Cask Republic!  Cask is everything you'd want in a bar - it's warm, inviting, has good food and has a great bartender for Monday (I did some...research... and vetted him).  Did I also mention the tiny fact that they have FIFTY THREE beers on tap? 80+ bottled beers? Leapin' Lizards that's a great selection!!

Their selection is constantly changing, but most of their beers run $5-8. 

They also have a fully stocked bar.  Waiting for you. 

We all know Christmas and relatives (or chinese food and movies and relatives, or however you celebrate Festivus...) is great, but can be a bit draining.  Relax with your friends and unwind with a pint.

Devorah will host this happy hour, phone number in RSVP should you have any issues.

Please RSVP for this event so we can give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
